meanings.definition: More saintly in character or behavior.
meanings.sent1: She always acts in a saintlier way than anyone I know.
meanings.sent2: The priest's saintlier demeanor brought comfort to the troubled souls.
meanings.sent3: Even in the chaos, her saintlier presence calmed the situation.
meanings.sent4: His saintlier nature shone through, guiding others with kindness.
meanings.sent5: The saintlier aura around her made people believe in goodness.

meanings.sent1: He prays saintlier than anyone else in the congregation.
meanings.sent2: The nun sings saintlier during the evening service.
meanings.sent3: She walks saintlier than an angel in the church courtyard.
meanings.sent4: The monk meditates saintlier than the rest of the monastery.
meanings.sent5: The choir sings saintlier when the sun sets behind the steeple.
